extendedInfo.description: â Now with FREE to enter PRIZE games.â Featured in The Sunday Times âTop 500 Apps in the Worldâ.âA fiendishly addictive time-killer, this pits you against improving opposition, from pub player Barry Bumble to world championship legends Eric Bristow and John Lowe. The mechanics are simple, and you get used to the frustration of seeing your once-a-week 180 denied by the wire. Sid Waddell style commentary and feverish announcements keep a rowdy crowd on the edge of their seats.â The Sunday Times 29-01-2012 âââââ Have You Got The Bulls? Take your darts skills out of your local and challenge players worldwide, without even having to buy them a pint, with Legends of Darts PRO ONLINE. Players will need timing, accuracy and nerve to rise to the top of the league in this absorbing game, which was originally developed from a âSkill with Prizesâ (SWP) pub machine by leading UK independent developer FatSpanner. âThis is not a simulator, it takes the strategic rather than the physical elements of the darts game. âLegends of Darts enjoyed tens of millions of plays in UK pubs before we developed the original iPhone game, Legends of Darts WORLD MASTERS. Building on the success of the original iPhone top 10 game Legends of Darts WORLD MASTERS, Legends of Darts PRO ONLINE takes arcade darts to another level. Play against friends or hundreds of thousands of other players online in both league play and exclusive tournaments. Legends of Darts PRO ONLINE features... â¢Online worldwide league play and world rankings. â¢Regular online tournaments. â¢Worldwide hall of fame. â¢Play your friends online or via Bluetooth. â¢âShot Outâ aid to help with mental arithmetic in the heat of battle. â¢Play left or right handed. â¢Optional âZoomâ feature. â¢Listen to your own music while playing. â¢Improved game play.What's New in this VersionFeatures â¢iPad3 compatible â¢Online name retrieval using password system â¢Same Online name can be used on multiple devices (not at the same time) â¢Online name change made easier â¢Handicap competitions â¢'Paid' version only online competitions â¢Took in-game adverts off Lite version to make gamely smoother Improvements to network reliability

reviews.title: Galaxy s3
reviews.comment: Best darts game out there by far. But cant play online and also would be great if there was more players and tournaments
reviews.author: grant evans

reviews.title: Sux
reviews.comment: WOW...DOES FARSPANNER SUK BALLZ!!! Yesterday (4 1st X in 6days) the server was back up. But obviously an April fools joke, as it crashed, YET AGAIN, n is STILL DOWN. MAYBE ILL TRY BACK AGAIN INA WEEK OR SO. FATSPANNER, worst Co. EVER!!!!!!
reviews.author: Peter Fisher

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Fantastic game! Best dart game I have seen. However I can\'t play online. Keeps asking for a username and password, don\'t know what it is. Anyone help?
reviews.author: Luke Irelan-Hill

reviews.title: Absolutely brilliant darts but.
reviews.comment: Its a absolute nightmare to get online! ! Its saying my account is being used by another device  I have tried unlinking my name and password but doesn\'t work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fabulous!!!
reviews.comment: The only way they could improve on this would be to make it possible to choose who you play online,  so you could play your friends. Other than that,  it really earns it\'s 5*****\'s........love it!!!
reviews.author: Mor Spiller

reviews.title: Galaxy note 2
reviews.comment: Great game but constant server issues and the lack of people online leaves it a disappointment. Otherwise it would be a 5
reviews.author: Edward Mc Nulty

reviews.title: GT-N7105 user
reviews.comment: I use this against CPU opponents so far, it has the best board graphically.  No complaint from me.
reviews.author: Ian Hare

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Good game when working. Tried going into the online tournament like before and it keeps saying that the device is using the network or something so it doesn\'t let me play online now :(
reviews.author: Lucy Norton

reviews.title: Razor reynolds
reviews.comment: Great game havin pic up of yourself when playin online be good with chat like dart night on apple phones if that happens gets 5 stars
reviews.author: Dawn Peters

reviews.title: Almost
reviews.comment: Excellent game would give it 5 stars if you were able to pick friends to play online friendlies.
reviews.author: Craig Collins

reviews.title: Online play very frustrating
reviews.comment: Would be five stars if the server issue was rectified, very annoying.
reviews.author: Jason Wood

reviews.title: Great BUT
reviews.comment: ADVERTS AT BEGINNING OF GAME ???? WTF I PAID FOR THIS, SHOULDNT BE ANY ADVERTS, 5 STARS WHEN REMOVED
reviews.author: Kev Wilding

reviews.title: Inconsistent
reviews.comment: When it works it,s good but far too many server errors . No response to queries about server from support team.
reviews.author: tim b

reviews.title: Use to be good
reviews.comment: Just had notification to join the barry bumble cup and the game will not even play. Been like it since last year...works then nothing for weeks. Do not bother paying for the pro version...waste of time. Uninstall-reinstall,contact ..no reply..CRAP.
reviews.author: Darren Perry

reviews.title: Far far far far too easy
reviews.comment: What\'s the point in playing a game where most on line players throw 9 darters constantly? How realistic is that? Looks nice though
reviews.author: M L Cunn

reviews.title: almost
reviews.comment: cannot stop playing, great that you now have sorted the device problems, but i still have problems getting logged on to the server... would definitely recommend downloading as long as server issues sorted then 5stars
reviews.author: Chris Neal

reviews.title: Good game, well worth 69p
reviews.comment: The game is good on the whole, but it could do with improvement especially on the darts they do look a bit pixilated
reviews.author: David Jarnot

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Excellent darts game; very addictive. Only fault I can find is the link to the iPhone only game/app at startup, which is ridiculous in an Android app. Other than that its 5 stars.
reviews.author: Ronan Cruise

reviews.title: Best Darts game on android
reviews.comment: Love this game, cant stop playing it.  online play is excellent. Keep up the good work fatspanner.
reviews.author: Dean Warnham

reviews.title: Not happy
reviews.comment: Paid and can\'t play, just remains on initial losing screen,... Devo
reviews.author: Kel Brasher
